title: What is the marketing strategy behind K-pop's global success? - Quora

response.answer_text: cuz its so different from the western market , ppl are attracted to kpop , their dances , clothes , music videos , their fan service , merchs , idol interactions , everything is manufactured , they are trained to do all of these thats why they have become perfect in these things and people like it . they make so much of content that a western artist has made in his/her career , they constantly keep the fans on their toes , they dont let the fans forget them .
